author: CNN Staff
title: Best moments in travel
text:
(CNN) Travel is a joy.
We all know that.
But sometimes being on the road transcends mere enjoyment.
New finds.
New friends.
New favorites.
You know -- the stuff credit card ads are made of.
Some of life's best moments happen only when you're on the road.
In honor of touristic serendipity, we've canvassed our staff for a list of top travel moments.
You'll find our faves in the above gallery.
Got your own best travel moments?
Share them on Twitter, Facebook or Instagram with the hashtag #CNNTravelMoments for a chance to be featured on CNN.com.
